problem_names:
lemma below_lubmapI[intro]:
  "m k = Some v \<Longrightarrow> (e k v::'a::Join_cpo) \<sqsubseteq> (\<Squnion> k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. e k v)"

lemma lubmap_belowI[intro]:
  "(\<And> k v . m k = Some v \<Longrightarrow> (e k v::'a::Join_cpo) \<sqsubseteq> u) \<Longrightarrow> (\<Squnion> k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. e k v) \<sqsubseteq> u"

lemma lubmap_map_upd[simp]:
  fixes e :: "'a \<Rightarrow> 'b \<Rightarrow> ('c :: Join_cpo)"
  shows "(\<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m(k' \<mapsto> v'). e k v) = e k' v' \<squnion> (\<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m(k':=None). e k v)"

lemma lubmap_below_cong:
  assumes "\<And> k v. m k = Some v \<Longrightarrow> f1 k v \<sqsubseteq> (f2 k v :: 'a :: Join_cpo)"
  shows "(\<Squnion> k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f1 k v) \<sqsubseteq> (\<Squnion> k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f2 k v)"

lemma cont2cont_lubmap[simp, cont2cont]:
  assumes "(\<And>k v . cont (f k v))"
  shows "cont (\<lambda>x. \<Squnion> k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. (f k v x) :: 'a :: Join_cpo)"
translations:
lemma below_lubmapI[intro]:
  "m k = Some v \<Longrightarrow> (e k v::'a::Join_cpo) \<sqsubseteq> (\<Squnion> k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. e k v)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. m k = Some v \<Longrightarrow> e k v \<sqsubseteq> lub (mapCollect e m)
unfolding mapCollect_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. m k = Some v \<Longrightarrow>
    e k v \<sqsubseteq> lub {e k v |k v. m k = Some v}
by auto

lemma lubmap_belowI[intro]:
  "(\<And> k v . m k = Some v \<Longrightarrow> (e k v::'a::Join_cpo) \<sqsubseteq> u) \<Longrightarrow> (\<Squnion> k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. e k v) \<sqsubseteq> u"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>k v.
        m k = Some v \<Longrightarrow>
        e k v \<sqsubseteq> u) \<Longrightarrow>
    lub (mapCollect e m) \<sqsubseteq> u
unfolding mapCollect_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>k v.
        m k = Some v \<Longrightarrow>
        e k v \<sqsubseteq> u) \<Longrightarrow>
    lub {e k v |k v. m k = Some v} \<sqsubseteq> u
by auto

lemma lubmap_const_bottom[simp]:
  "(\<Squnion> k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. \<bottom>) = (\<bottom>::'a::Join_cpo)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. \<bottom>) = \<bottom>
by (cases "m = Map.empty") auto

lemma lubmap_map_upd[simp]:
  fixes e :: "'a \<Rightarrow> 'b \<Rightarrow> ('c :: Join_cpo)"
  shows "(\<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m(k' \<mapsto> v'). e k v) = e k' v' \<squnion> (\<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m(k':=None). e k v)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lub (mapCollect e (m(k' \<mapsto> v'))) =
    e k' v' \<squnion> lub (mapCollect e (m(k' := None)))
by simp

lemma lubmap_below_cong:
  assumes "\<And> k v. m k = Some v \<Longrightarrow> f1 k v \<sqsubseteq> (f2 k v :: 'a :: Join_cpo)"
  shows "(\<Squnion> k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f1 k v) \<sqsubseteq> (\<Squnion> k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f2 k v)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. lub (mapCollect f1 m) \<sqsubseteq> lub (mapCollect f2 m)
apply (rule lubmap_belowI)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>k v.
       m k = Some v \<Longrightarrow>
       f1 k v \<sqsubseteq> lub (mapCollect f2 m)
apply (rule below_trans[OF assms], assumption)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>k v.
       m k = Some v \<Longrightarrow>
       f2 k v \<sqsubseteq> lub (mapCollect f2 m)
apply (rule below_lubmapI, assumption)

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done

lemma cont2cont_lubmap[simp, cont2cont]:
  assumes "(\<And>k v . cont (f k v))"
  shows "cont (\<lambda>x. \<Squnion> k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. (f k v x) :: 'a :: Join_cpo)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. cont (\<lambda>x. \<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v x)
proof (rule contI2)

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. monofun (\<lambda>x. \<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v x)
 2. \<And>Y.
       \<lbrakk>chain Y;
        chain
         (\<lambda>i. \<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v (Y i))\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (\<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m.
                             f k v (\<Squnion>i. Y i)) \<sqsubseteq>
                         (\<Squnion>i.
                             \<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v (Y i))
show "monofun (\<lambda>x. \<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v x)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. monofun (\<lambda>x. \<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v x)
apply (rule monofunI)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y.
       x \<sqsubseteq> y \<Longrightarrow>
       (\<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v x) \<sqsubseteq>
       (\<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v y)
apply (rule lubmap_below_cong)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y k v.
       \<lbrakk>x \<sqsubseteq> y; m k = Some v\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> f k v x \<sqsubseteq> f k v y
apply (erule cont2monofunE[OF assms])

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done

proof (state)
this:
  monofun (\<lambda>x. \<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v x)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Y.
       \<lbrakk>chain Y;
        chain
         (\<lambda>i. \<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v (Y i))\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (\<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m.
                             f k v (\<Squnion>i. Y i)) \<sqsubseteq>
                         (\<Squnion>i.
                             \<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v (Y i))
next

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Y.
       \<lbrakk>chain Y;
        chain
         (\<lambda>i. \<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v (Y i))\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (\<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m.
                             f k v (\<Squnion>i. Y i)) \<sqsubseteq>
                         (\<Squnion>i.
                             \<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v (Y i))
fix Y :: "nat \<Rightarrow> 'd"

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Y.
       \<lbrakk>chain Y;
        chain
         (\<lambda>i. \<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v (Y i))\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (\<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m.
                             f k v (\<Squnion>i. Y i)) \<sqsubseteq>
                         (\<Squnion>i.
                             \<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v (Y i))
assume "chain Y"

proof (state)
this:
  chain Y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Y.
       \<lbrakk>chain Y;
        chain
         (\<lambda>i. \<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v (Y i))\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (\<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m.
                             f k v (\<Squnion>i. Y i)) \<sqsubseteq>
                         (\<Squnion>i.
                             \<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v (Y i))
assume "chain (\<lambda>i. \<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v (Y i))"

proof (state)
this:
  chain (\<lambda>i. \<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v (Y i))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Y.
       \<lbrakk>chain Y;
        chain
         (\<lambda>i. \<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v (Y i))\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (\<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m.
                             f k v (\<Squnion>i. Y i)) \<sqsubseteq>
                         (\<Squnion>i.
                             \<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v (Y i))
show "(\<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v (\<Squnion> i. Y i)) \<sqsubseteq> (\<Squnion> i. \<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v (Y i))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v (\<Squnion>i. Y i)) \<sqsubseteq>
    (\<Squnion>i. \<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v (Y i))
apply (subst cont2contlubE[OF assms \<open>chain Y\<close>])

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. \<Squnion>i. f k v (Y i)) \<sqsubseteq>
    (\<Squnion>i. \<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v (Y i))
apply (rule lubmap_belowI)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>k v.
       m k = Some v \<Longrightarrow>
       (\<Squnion>i. f k v (Y i)) \<sqsubseteq>
       (\<Squnion>i. \<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v (Y i))
apply (rule lub_mono[OF ch2ch_cont[OF assms \<open>chain Y\<close>] \<open>chain (\<lambda>i. \<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v (Y i))\<close>])

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>k v i.
       m k = Some v \<Longrightarrow>
       f k v (Y i) \<sqsubseteq> (\<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v (Y i))
apply (erule below_lubmapI)

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done

proof (state)
this:
  (\<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v (\<Squnion>i. Y i)) \<sqsubseteq>
  (\<Squnion>i. \<Squnion>k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. f k v (Y i))

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

(*
syntax
  "_BLubMapFilter" :: "[pttrn, pttrn, 'a \<rightharpoonup> 'b, 'b, bool] \<Rightarrow> 'b" ("(3\<Squnion>/_/\<mapsto>/_/\<in>/_/./ _/ |/ _)" [0,0,0,10,10] 10)

translations
  "\<Squnion> k\<mapsto>v\<in>m. e | P" == "CONST lub (CONST mapCollectFilter (\<lambda>k v. (P,e)) m)"
*)
end
